interface.name: gpm_stream_connect
interface.summary: Connect to GPM over a unix domain stream socket.

interface.name: gpm_getattr_gpmctl
interface.summary: Get the attributes of the GPM control channel named socket.

interface.name: gpm_dontaudit_getattr_gpmctl
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of the GPM control channel named socket.

interface.name: gpm_setattr_gpmctl
interface.summary: Set the attributes of the GPM control channel named socket.
